Description.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, that describes a finding that is an observation of body temperature

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Temperature subset with subset original id 901000000132.
For the Telehealth domain, a subset is currently being defined.

Description.p: The use of this subset is Mandatory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."Â
